## Code Style
- Prefers to keep extra blank lines in code for personal readability; do not remove their blank lines unless explicitly requested.
- Use specific formatting rules
- Follow naming conventions
- Write simple code without unnecessary parts.
- Include clear explanatory comments with decorative separators like `// ============== blocks` or `// ------------- blocks` or `// -------~*~------- blocks` or other design.
